column1: We’re hiring a Junior Cloud Support Engineer to assist customers with basic troubleshooting, VM setup, and cloud deployment workflows. Must have strong problem-solving skills, eagerness to learn, and ability to support L1 tickets. Onsite role in Pune with urgent joining preferred.

excellent opportunity for Python Backend Developers

Job Location: Bangalore (Only)

Experience required : 4-7 yrs

Skills: Python, FastAPI, SQL, Docker

Location: Remote

Role Overview:

As an Entry-Level Digital Literacy Instructor, you will deliver interactive online training to learners aged 10–21. Sessions include teaching basic coding logic, productivity tools, safe internet usage, and foundational digital skills.

You will tailor delivery methods based on each student’s grasping speed to maintain engagement and outcomes.

This role requires patience, creativity, and passion for teaching technology with a human touch.
